src:
(Vidéo) : Ndeye Guèye, danseuse : Wally Seck lay khar pour mou diokh ma ndiguel si sama… »
01 Nov 2019, 11:54 by La redaction
Si Youssou Ndour est son « papa », Wally Seck est son préféré. Ndeye Guèye voue une admiration inconditionnelle au Faramareen.Dans une interview accordée à Feeling Dakar, la danseuse est revenue sur son amitié avec Wally Seck. Profitant de l’occasion, Ndeye Guèye a félicité l’artiste qui l’a amenée en France pour assister à son spectacle au Dôme de Paris.Interrogée sur son absence, la danseuse révèle qu’elle attend l’aval de Wally Seck pour aller au studio et enregistrer un album.
text:
(Video): Ndeye Guèye, dancer: Wally Seck lay khar for mou diokh ma ndiguel si sama ... »
01 Nov 2019, 11:54 by The editorial team
If Youssou Ndour is his "daddy", Wally Seck is his favorite. Ndeye Guèye has an unconditional admiration for Faramareen. In an interview with Feeling Dakar, the dancer returned to her friendship with Wally Seck. Taking advantage of the opportunity, Ndeye Guèye congratulated the artist who brought her to France to attend her show at the Dôme de Paris. Asked about her absence, the dancer reveals that she is waiting for the approval of Wally Seck to go at the studio and record an album.
